exp.author: Joshua Espinoza
exp.desc: The United States Coast Guard confirmed the incident occurred Thursday near an uninhabited island off Puerto Rico. At least 31 people have been rescued.
exp.title: At Least 11 Dead After Boat Capsizes Near Puerto Rico

exp.author: Brenton Blanchet
exp.desc: Using the Event Horizon Telescope, astronomers have shared the first-ever image captured of the Milky Way's black hole, named Sagittarius A*.
exp.title: Astronomers Reveal the First-Ever Photo of Black Hole in Milky Way

exp.author: Joe Price
exp.desc: In a video of their March arrest in Hawaii, 'The Flash' actor Ezra Miller claimed they film clips when they're assaulted to sell as "NFT crypto art."
exp.title: Arrest Video Shows Ezra Miller Claiming 'I Film Myself When I Get Assaulted for NFT Crypto Art'

exp.author: Brad Callas
exp.desc: Brooklyn Nets GM Sean Marks spoke to the media on Wednesday for the first time since the team was swept out of the first round by the Boston Celtics.
exp.title: Here's Nets GM Sean Marks' Response to Whether or Not Team Is Committed to Kyrie Long-Term

exp.author: Brenton Blanchet
exp.desc: A woman in Portland, who was in the middle of a trying custody battle, shot and killed her two children before killing herself, according to local police.
exp.title: Woman in Custody Battle Shoots and Kills Two Young Children, Then Herself

exp.author: Trace William Cowen
exp.desc: On the track "Savior," Kendrick also reflects on a scenario in which a vaccine-averse Christian has a change of heart after catching COVID-19.
exp.title: Kendrick Lamar Mentions Kyrie Irving's COVID Vaccine Controversy on 'Mr. Morale & the Big Steppers' Track "Savior"

exp.author: Joe Price
exp.desc: Former Brooklyn Nets player development assistant Amar'e Stoudemire ripped into James Harden's apparent lack of work ethic and dedication to the game.
exp.title: Amar'e Stoudemire Rips James Harden's Work Ethic, Says He Wasn't in 'Top Shape'

exp.author: Jose Martinez
exp.desc: A Texas inmate serving a life sentence for capital murder escaped custody after stabbing the officer driving a transport bus and causing the vehicle to crash.
exp.title: Texas Inmate Serving Sentence for Murder Escapes After Stabbing Bus Driver During Transport

exp.author: Brenton Blanchet
exp.desc: Rust Movie Productions is hitting back at a $137,000 fine from the state of New Mexico, which argues per a sanction that there were workplace safety violations.
exp.title: Producers Say Safety Meeting Was Held on Morning of Fatal Alec Baldwin 'Rust' Shooting

exp.author: Jose Martinez
exp.desc: A livestream once again captured a bizarre moment in the life of Andy Dick. This time, he was taken into custody on suspicion of sexual battery.
exp.title: Andy Dick Arrested on Suspicion of Sexual Battery During Livestream

exp.author: Jose Martinez
exp.desc: Norm Macdonald filmed a secret hour-long stand-up special for Netflix during the height of the pandemic in the event of his death from a procedure.
exp.title: Norm Macdonald Secretly Filmed Netflix Stand-Up Special Prior to His Death

exp.author: Brenton Blanchet
exp.desc: The daughter of NBA legend Dwyane Wade spoke alongside stepmother Gabrielle Union about coming out as trans and how online beauty advice has impacted her.
exp.title: Zaya Wade on 'Hateful Comments' After Coming Out as Trans: 'That Kind of Advice Is Just Trying to Break You'

exp.author: Jose Martinez
exp.desc: A group of people worked together to stop a moving car as it slowly passed through a busy intersection after the driver suffered a "medical episode" in Florida.
exp.title: Video Shows People Stopping Car Passing Through Busy Intersection After Driver Suffers 'Medical Episode'

exp.author: Jose Martinez
exp.desc: A son and his wife in India have been sued by his parents for "mental cruelty" because they have not given them a grandchild after six years of marriage.
exp.title: Parents File Lawsuit Against Son and Daughter-in-Law for Not Having Grandchild

exp.author: Sydney Brasil
exp.desc: ESPN has called on Murda Beatz for a remix of the iconic NHL on ESPN theme song in honour of the first round of the NHL Stanley Cup playoffs.
exp.title: ESPN Taps Murda Beatz for Remix of "NHL on ESPN" Theme Song

exp.author: Brenton Blanchet
exp.desc: The Dallas Mavericks have been named as a party that could have prevented the sex trafficking of a teenage girl who attended one of the team's home games.
exp.title: Dallas Mavericks Could Have Prevented Sex Trafficking of Teenage Girl, Attorney Says

exp.author: Trace William Cowen
exp.desc: Kim's remarks arrive via a new episode of Hulu's 'The Kardashians,' which has seen the family continue their reality TV journey post-'KUWTK.'
exp.title: Kim Kardashian Says Kanye West 'Told Me My Career's Over' After Styling Herself for Innovator Awards

exp.author: Joe Price
exp.desc: On 'Jimmy Kimmel Live,' Alfonso Ribeiro revealed he doesn't appreciate it when fans ask him to recreate his iconic 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air       ' dance.
exp.title: Alfonso Ribeiro Has a Very Direct Response to People Asking Him to Do Carlton Dance

exp.author: Joshua Espinoza
exp.desc: Lorals, the maker of ultrathin prophylactic undergarments, received FDA authorization to market its products as an effective way to prevent STIs.
exp.title: FDA Clears Latex Underwear to Protect Against STIs

exp.author: Joshua Espinoza
exp.desc: Colorado authorities say the 23-year-old was taken into custody on Thursday. He's charged with criminal tampering with a domestic violence enhancer.
exp.title: Broncos WR Jerry Jeudy Arrested in Connection to Domestic Violence Investigation, Charged With Criminal Tampering

exp.author: Joe Price
exp.desc: Disney has shared the first trailer for 'Rise,' the biographical sports drama about the ascent of Giannis Antetokounmpo and his two brothers.
exp.title: Watch the First Trailer for Giannis Antetokounmpo Biopic 'Rise' From Disney+

exp.author: Trace William Cowen
exp.desc: There is debate as to the seriousness with which these concerns should be treated, with some arguing it's temporary while others insist it's only the start.
exp.title: Crypto Market Loses $200 Billion in Single Day

exp.desc: Girondins de Bordeaux's Marcelo was dropped by Olympique Lyonnais earlier this season, reportedly due to "continuous farting and laughing" in the dressing room.
exp.title: Marcelo Was Reportedly Demoted by Lyon Due to 'Repeatedly Farting' in Locker Room, Laughing at Manager and Director

exp.title: Charles Barkley Declares He Was 2nd Best Player on 1992 Dream Team That Featured Jordan, Magic, and Larry Bird

exp.author: Calum Marsh
exp.desc: Brantford-born Devyn Nekoda chatted with Complex Canada about her role in the Disney+ film 'Sneakerella,' her Canadian roots, and sneakerhead culture.
exp.title: 'Sneakerella' Star Devyn Nekoda Talks Sneaker Culture and Pretending Toronto Is New York

exp.title: 'Forbes' Reveals 2022's Highest Paid Athletes

exp.author: Joshua Espinoza
exp.desc: The 24-year-old model posted a several photos this week in which she seemingly debuted her tribute ink for Ye. You can check out the images here.
exp.title: Chaney Jones Apparently Got Kanye's Name Tattooed Near Her Wrist

exp.author: Joe Price
exp.desc: The parents of the 10-year-old Louisiana boy have filed a federal lawsuit against the local sheriff's office for allegedly violating their child's civil rights.
exp.title: Lawsuit Claims Louisiana Deputy Put 10-Year-Old Boy With Disabilities in Chokehold

exp.author: Joshua Espinoza
exp.desc: Noah mourned the death of his grandma, Frances Noah, who died this week at age 95: "A woman who showed me the truest definition of unconditional love."
exp.title: Trevor Noah Posts Touching Tribute to His Late Grandma 'Gogo'

exp_featured.author: Joe Price
exp_featured.desc: Elon Musk announced that he's putting his deal to buy Twitter "temporarily on hold" following the release of a report citing the number of fake accounts.
exp_featured.title: Elon Musk Says His Takeover of Twitter Is 'Temporarily on Hold'
